Title: Liverpool ‘deserved’ defeat to Crystal Palace, says Slot
Summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says Crystal Palace 'deserved' 2-1 defeat at Selhurst Park . Premier League champions' perfect start to the season came to an abrupt end .

Title: PSG reclaim Ligue 1 top spot ahead of Barcelona clash
Summary: Paris Saint-Germain beat Auxerre 2-0 to reclaim Ligue 1 top spot ahead of Champions League clash with Barcelona . The French champions beat the French side 1-0 at home to the Etihad Stadium on Saturday .

Title: Palhinha rescues point for Tottenham against winless Wolves
Summary: Tottenham needed Joao Palhinha's stoppage-time strike to salvage a 1-1 draw at home to bottom-of-the-table Wolves . Thomas Frank said the Premier League is "relentless" after his Tottenham side needed a late goal .

Title: Nigeria’s Mahmoud Ben-Tukur re-elected to ICAO council
Summary: Nigeria secured re-election into Part II of the Council of the International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO) at the ongoing 42nd ICAO Assembly in Montreal, Canada . Nigeria has secured a major diplomatic win for the country .

Title: Edo activist arrested over confrontation with LP chairman Abure
Summary: Edo-based activist, Precious Oruche, popularly known as ‘Mama Pee, was detained by police following a heated confrontation with factional National Chairman of the Labour Party, Julius Abure, at the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport, Abuja .

Title: After fresh Borno killing, Ndume seeks deployment of troops to safeguard Nigeria’s border
Summary: Former Chairman Senate Committee on Army, Senator Ali Ndume, has called on military authorities to deploy troops to Kirawa in Borno State . This followed Friday’s Boko Haram ambush along the Kirawa-Pulka road at around 3:00 pm .

Title: 2027: Ganduje descends on Kwankwaso
Summary: Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje has taken swipes at both his estranged political ally, Senator Rabi’u Musa Kwankwaso, and Governor Abba Kabir Yusuf . He described their politics as inconsistent and their governance style as “directionless”

Title: Tinubu inherited deep challenges that could not be erased in two years — Muyiwa Coker
Summary: Mr Olumuyiwa Coker is a Chartered Stockbroker . He was an aspirant for the ticket of the All Progressives Congress (APC)

Title: Olojo festival: Adeleke urges politicians to embrace unity
Summary: Ademola Adeleke made the call at the grand finale of the annual Olojo festival in Ile-Ife . The governor, represented by his deputy, Kola Adewusi, emphasised unity .

Title: Ekiti tops fiscal transparency ranking with 100% success rate
Summary: Ekiti State recognised again as the most fiscally transparent state in Nigeria . The rating was based on budget approval, quarterly BIR, 2023 audited financial statements, Accountant-General’s accounts . Ekiti has a perfect 100% score across all fiscal transparency benchmarks .
